definition: to have a heart of stone/hard-hearted/unfeeling
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: How long must the iron-hearted monster feed on our life's blood?
sentences.chinese: 这铁石心肠的怪物吸着我们的血液，还得吸多久呢？

sentences.english: That weaves its spell on even a stone heart?
sentences.chinese: 竟把咒语织进铁石心肠？

sentences.english: The sad condition of these refugees would move a heart of stone to sympathy。
sentences.chinese: 这些难民的悲惨处境能使一个铁石心肠动容。

sentences.english: The man has a heart of stone and he will never help anybody.
sentences.chinese: 那个人有副铁石心肠，他从不帮助任何人。

sentences.english: He has a heart of stone.
She doesn't know the meaning of pity. She has a heart of stone.
sentences.chinese: 看到我这样的死法，即使铁石心肠的人也会怜悯你的。

sentences.english: You had my heart of stone, not in the full moon night languish.
sentences.chinese: 你炼就了我的铁石心肠，不会在月圆的夜苦苦期盼。

sentences.english: He was a despot with a heart of granite.
sentences.chinese: 我认为汤姆是一个铁石心肠的人。

sentences.english: His enthusiasm is enough to melt a heart of stone.
sentences.chinese: 他的热诚足以软化铁石心肠。

sentences.english: The sad condition of these refugees would move a heart of stone to sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 这些难民的悲惨处境能使一个铁石心肠动容。

sentences.english: My boss is so hard-hearted. He gave us only half a day vacation for Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我的老板真是铁石心肠，圣诞节只给了我们半天假。

sentences.english: Amy's pitiless step-mother refused to look after her when she was seriously ill.
sentences.chinese: 艾咪那个铁石心肠的继母在她生重病时不肯照料她。

sentences.english: She has a heart of stone .
Her husband is a hard-hearted man.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫是个铁石心肠的人。

sentences.english: The stone-hearted man refused to help the old man.
sentences.chinese: 这个铁石心肠的人拒帮助那位老人。

sentences.english: Never in a million years, I thought the tears could break a heart of stone.
sentences.chinese: 千年的轮回，纵然铁石心肠，也终会被清泪所融化。

definition: to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
heart/intention/one's inclination/state of mind/to have the heart for sth/mood
completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb
as cold as ice and frost (idiom, usually of woman); icy manner/frigid
lit. to feel as if one's intestines have been cut short/broken-hearted (idiom)
see 刀子嘴，豆腐心[dao1 zi5 zui3 , dou4 fu5 xin1]
